sentences.en: A NEW SUBSPECIES OF HYLA SIMPLEX BOETTGER FROM CHINA ( AMPHIBIA: HYLIDAE )
sentences.cn: 华南雨蛙Hylasimplex-新亚种 ( 两栖纲: 雨蛙科 )

sentences.en: All five remaining tiger subspecies are endangered, and many protection programs are in place.
sentences.cn: 所有现存的5个亚种都是濒危动物, 许多保护机制已经实施.

sentences.en: All subspecies of the tiger have been declared endangered.
sentences.cn: 所有老虎的亚种已经被宣布濒危。

sentences.en: CENETIC AND SUBSPECIES DIVERGENCES WITHIN THE RED PANDA ( CARNIVORA: PROCYONIDAE )
sentences.cn: 小熊猫种内遗传及亚种分化研究 ( 食肉目: 浣熊科 )

sentences.en: Dick ( 1983 ) considered Ts is the exclusive species, and Tna , Tne, Tp are subspecies.
sentences.cn: 而Dick ( 1983 ) 却认为Ts是唯一的种, Tna、 Tne 、 Tp应视为三个亚种.

sentences.en: Ice trolls are a subspecies of troll that lives in cold climates.
sentences.cn: 冰霜巨魔是一种生活在寒冷气候中的巨魔亚种.

sentences.en: In their original description these types are morphologically distinct enough to classify them as subspecies.
sentences.cn: 在他们最早的论述中,这些类型在形态上是截然不同的,完全可以把它们分成亚种.

sentences.en: North American subspecies of tundra swan having a soft whistling note.
sentences.cn: 冻原天鹅的北美洲亚种,以其柔和的鸣叫著名.

sentences.en: Several other subspecies of gull are found in the region.
sentences.cn: 几个海鸥的其他亚种在此地区被找到。

sentences.en: Subspecies just do not carry as much political clout.
sentences.cn: 因为亚物种一般很难引起政治家的注意.

sentences.en: Subspecies that are differentiated by the markings on their wings.
sentences.cn: 可通过各自翅膀上的标记来加以区别亚种的不同生物.

sentences.en: The basic body type comprises a great variety of beholder subspecies.
sentences.cn: 眼魔亚种极多,基本形象各不相同.

sentences.en: The wild subspecies that gave up their DNA for these tests still exist, though barely.
sentences.cn: 这些野生亚种猫被放弃的DNA尽管存量稀少,但是在上述试验中依然存在.

sentences.en: These draenei have since mutated into lesser forms , resulting in a series of subspecies.
sentences.cn: 这些draenei从此变弱了,并且分成了几个亚种.

sentences.en: Three subspecies are currently recognized, including the nominate subspecies described here.
sentences.cn: 目前德州细盲蛇下有三个亚种已被确认.

sentences.en: Variety The taxonomic group below the subspecies level.
sentences.cn: 变种:分类学中亚种水平以下的群体.

trans.tran_en: a group of similar plants or animals that is smaller than a  species
